title: Too Big To Jail
description: On this episode, Kate and Luigi use a recent criminal case against Walmart over its sale of opioids to explain the tactics many huge corporations use to dodge the justice system.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
